tool_description: API to fetch country information for given IP Address
name: shw-geolocation-api
title: shw-geolocation-api

api_list.name: get geolocation data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shw-geolocation-api.p.rapidapi.com/geo/geoip/8.8.8.8"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shw-geolocation-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shw-geolocation-api.p.rapidapi.com/geo/geoip/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shw-geolocation-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
